description: Episode of Series "Piaget's Developmental Theory". Illustrates tasks that challenge the thinking of postprimary school students. Involves proportional reasoning, separation of variables, combinatorial logic and the integration of these in an analysis of a balanced beam with weights. Suitable for tertiary level and teachers.
